General.Name: Key Ware Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Key Ware Electronics Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and processes raw materials for printed circuit boards in Taiwan. It offers prepreg, drillers, router bits, cutting tools, tungsten steel drilling, and laser and molding OEM services. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 32, Sing Bang Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan
